pages.text: The $(d)Spectre Sword$() is comparable to a Diamond Sword, with higher durability and enchantability.$(br2)It increases your entity interaction range by 3 blocks, and can be used to kill Spirits.

The $(d)Spectre Pickaxe, Axe, and Shovel$() are each comparable to their Diamond counterpart, with higher durability and enchantability.$(br2)Each of them increases your block interaction range by 3 blocks.
